root.name: Time and Eternity
root.description: OverviewTime and Eternity is an anime-style Japanese RPG developed by Imageepoch with animation by Satelight. It aspires to recreate the look of an anime show by using hand-drawn HD sprites moving in 3D environments. The game features an action-based combat system. It was released in Japan in 2012 and North America in 2013.
